Description: Painted wooden shabti of Mutemwiya with black tripartite wig, white body, red face with white eyes and black cosmetic lines, red hands holding two red hoes, red basket on back, red bordered vertical line of black hieroglyphs down lower front half, white fillet.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
